full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI BSNYEN SGRUB LAS GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG DNGOS GRUB 'DOD DGU'I DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @063A *, ,(CES RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI BSNYEN SGRUB LAS GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG DNGOS GRUB 'DOD DGU'I DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI KHYAD PAR SKYABS MGON RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN GZIGS CHEN PO RJE BTZUN NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN MKHYEN RAB 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS BRTAN GZHUNG SA DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG CHEN PO'I CHAB SRID MNGA' THANG BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG MCHOG DMAN PAR GSUM SOGS LA DGOS PA DU MA'I CHED DU DMIGS NAS LAS SMON BZANG PO 'BREL BA'I RTZE'I GNYER TSAN PA BYAMS PA CHOS BZANG BAS NAN CHER BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ZHVA LU BA SHES RAB RIN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I GTOR SGRUB LA GZHI BYAS NAS RGYUD DANG RGYA BOD KYI GZHUNG MANG PO NAS KHA BSKANG TE CHOS RJE MING CAN BSAM GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS LHA LDAN SA CHAR RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA'I BHU WA DNGOS PO ZHES PA'I SHING PHO KHYI @063B LO'I ZLA TSES BZANG PO'I 'PHEL SBYOR GYI NYIN LA SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,, *, ,AOm SVA STI, BSTAN BSRUNG RGYAL CHEN RNAM MANG THOS SRAS KYI, ,BSNYEN CING BSGRUB PA'I MAN NGAG GSANG BA'I MDZOD, ,'DOD PA'I RE SKONG BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR, ,RNAM DAG YID KYIS PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I MTHUS, ,SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE'I, ,ZHABS PAD BRTAN CING MDZAD 'PHRIN PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS, ,BDAG SOGS BYANG CHUB MA THOB PAR DU YANG, ,RNAM THOS SRAS KYIS G-YEL MED SKYONG GYUR CIG , ,,CES PA 'DI'ANG, MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI PAR DU BSGRUB PA'I SKABS SU RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I DGE BSHES BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS 'PHEL LAGS NAS DNGUL SRANG GSUM ZHO DRUG DANG, DKA' BCU BLA MA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS DNGUL SRANG GNYIS ZHO LNGA DPAR BZHENGS PA'I SHING BCAS ROG BYED CING, ,KHO BOS KYANG MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU BSGRUB PA'I @064A *, ,DGE BA RDZOGS BYANG DU BSNGO BA'I PHYIR DU, ,BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BRIS SO,, ,,)
